name: The lost soul (Mader245, M4TY, samot.cebukaj)
description:
The lost soul

You are the lost soul. 

Soul, of the person, that probably made some very unwise actions and ungrateful choices. 

As the lost soul, your main objective is, obviously, to reach heaven and retrieve ever lasting sacred peace. The only limit, is the sky.

Our team:
Eva Reitermannová
Matyas Himmer
Tomas Jakubec
Martin Vejsada
